name: Santorini Paradise
description:
Santorini Paradise is a walking simulator that explores the beautiful setting of one of Greece' most iconic locations. Navigate through narrow alleyways, clifftop veranders and inside beautiful homes to get a taste of the idyllic lifestyle everyone desires.

_____________________________________________________________

Gameplay

- Roam the narrow streets and experience the panoramic views while searching for scatted items of clothing.

- There is a double wooden gate that will open once all pieces are found.

- Discover the wonder that lies beyond the gates as you find your way home

______________________________________________________________

Controls

Movement - W, A, S, D

Jump - Spacebar

Interact - F
